General

disclaimer

The Travel Terms and Conditions of the Dutch Association of Travel Organizations govern any and all holidays offered by ID&T Travel on this website, in addition to ID&T Travel’s supplemental terms and conditions governing the booking of trips online.

Due care

ID&T Travel makes every possible effort to ensure that the information contained on this website is reliable and up to date. It is nonetheless possible that the information offered contains errors and/or is incomplete. Under no circumstances can ID&T Travel be held liable for obvious mistakes and typographical and entry errors.

Qualifications

ID&T Travel reserves the right to change the prices and packages without the visitor’s permission and to make changes to the website if the situation so requires. All flight and travel information is subject to change in the interim.

Published travel sums

Article 2, subsection 2: ID&T Travel’s offer is without engagement and ID&T Travel may revoke it if necessary. ID&T Travel must revoke an offer as quickly as possible and in any event within eight office hours after acceptance, stating its reason for doing so. Revocation in order to correct errors in the calculation of the total travel costs is permitted; revocation in order to increase the total travel costs must be in compliance with the requirements contained in Article 4 of the Travel Terms and Conditions of the Dutch Association of Travel Organizations.

Hyperlinks

This website contains hyperlinks to other websites. ID&T Travel is not responsible for and does not accept any liability whatsoever for the correctness, completeness and timeliness of the content of such websites or for their availability, or for whether the information that is made available by or via such websites may be used legally. The information contained on third parties’ websites that are linked to this website does not form part of the information that ID&T Travel makes available in order to book a ID&T Travel trip. Thus, the information on third parties’ websites that are linked to this website does not form part of any agreement between clients and ID&T Travel.

Electronic communication and evidence

ID&T Travel is not liable for any misunderstanding, mutilation, delay or failure to properly transfer data and messages as a result of the use of the Internet or any other means of communication in the transactions between the visitor and ID&T Travel (or between ID&T Travel and third parties engaged by the visitor), unless and only insofar as there has been an intentional act or omission or gross negligence on the part of ID&T Travel. ID&T Travel’s books and records constitute full evidence of the existence, the content and the performance of the agreement with the primary booker in the event of any legal proceedings, unless the party that claims that the evidence is unreliable provides evidence to the contrary.

Qualification system

ID&T Travel applies it own qualifica accommodation, the local tourist information offices and a number of (professional) photographers. The photographs of the accommodation are intended only to offer an idea. Because not every apartment or hotel room is the same, it is possible that the accommodation received on location will be different than the photograph.
